about_the_game:
Welcome to Super Marble Drop Deluxe, a delightful and relaxing puzzle game that will keep you entertained for hours! Dive into a colorful game where your goal is simple: drop marbles into a container and merge two of the same kind to create a bigger marble. Keep combining until you reach the ultimate prize – the stunning Rainbow Marble!

In Super Marble Drop Deluxe, there's no rush and no stress. With no time limits or score caps, you can take your time and play at your own pace. It's the perfect game to unwind after a long day or to keep your mind sharp and engaged. Play with a controller, just a mouse, or your favorite controller!

  • Easy to Learn, Hard to Master: Just drop and combine! Simple controls make it easy to start, but mastering the game requires strategy and skill. Don't let its simplicity fool you. How long will it take you to reach 5000 points?
  • Endless Relaxation: No time limits or pressure – just a calm puzzle experience.
  • Beautiful Marbles: Enjoy a variety of vibrant swirly marbles, each larger than the last. Reach the Rainbow Marble and see it vanish to free up space to keep playing!
  • High Score Challenge: Keep track of your progress and try to beat your personal best score. The more you play, the better you'll get!

If you're a fan of classic puzzle games, you'll love the relaxing and addictive gameplay of Super Marble Drop Deluxe. Perfect for players of all ages, this casual 2D puzzle game is a must-have for your collection. Buy Super Marble Drop Deluxe today begin your way to a high score!

name: Super Marble Drop Deluxe

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100T @ 2.5GHz or AMD FX 6100, or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or AMD Radeon HD 7750 with at least 1GB VRAM, or equivalent
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K @ 3.4GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 1600, or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580 with at least 4GB VRAM, or equivalent
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: In Super Marble Drop Deluxe, drop colorful, swirly marbles into a container. Combine two of the same marble to create a larger one and earn points. Keep merging marbles to increase your score without hitting the top line. How high can you go?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Armenian, Assamese, Azerbaijani, Bangla, Basque, Belarusian, Bosnian, Catalan, Cherokee, Croatian, Dari, Estonian, Filipino, Galician, Georgian, Gujarati, Hausa, Hebrew, Hindi, Icelandic, Igbo, Irish, K'iche', Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Kinyarwanda, Konkani, Kyrgyz, Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Nepali, Odia, Persian, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Quechua, Scots, Serbian, Sindhi, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Sorani, Sotho, Swahili, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Tigrinya, Tswana, Turkmen, Urdu, Uyghur, Uzbek, Valencian, Welsh, Wolof, Xhosa, Yoruba, Zulu
